quote: Be as fluid as water, do not give your enemies anything solid to attack. – Robert Greene
fact: The longest one-syllable word in the English language is "screeched."
joke: A man was caught stealing in a supermarket today while balanced on the shoulders of a couple of vampires. He was charged with shoplifting on two counts.
